channel.title: A Few Questions, TestScape Source. Im A Newb
channel.description:
Ok, So I Need Some Help With My Testscape Server.. Here They Are.
Question One. When I Go To Characters > (MyCharacter) I Change My Rights To 3 (Owner) I Compile and Log in. Im Not Admin or Mod, And My Rights Have gone back to 0.. Help Please?
Question Two. How Do I Delete NPC's from my server?
Question Three. How Do I Make Commands?
Last Question. How Can I Add a Dwarf Multicannon as a Admin Only weapon?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2007, 03:44:35 AM[/size][hr]Please Help

item.title: A Few Questions, TestScape Source. Im A Newb

item.description:
@Adelaide_Kin wrote:

So, Anyone Able To help about the cannon?

Read full topic

item.description:

oh yh good luck if you dont have admins file just click charachters wh you want to be admin click on them open and look and search for character-rights = 0 change to character-rights = 3
for owner 2 for admin and 1 for mod

item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

Question Three : go to one of your commands and add this undet the last }

if (command.startsWith("food")) { sendMessage("enjoy!"); addItem(398 100); }

item.title: A Few Questions, TestScape Source. Im A Newb
item.dc:creator: @Adelaide_Kin Adelaide Kin
item.description:
@Adelaide_Kin wrote:

[quote=“owner Ethan, post:2, topic:131417”]Question 1, go in data folder of ur server click admins type ur name in clikc save and login

Question 2, go in autospawn.cfg and find the npc names u wanna delete

Question 3, IDFK

Last Question, Hang on il get code[/quote]

Ok Ill wait, And Thanks. ;]

Read full topic
